website_summaries.verdict: The cool color of this classic-style canopy is a great choice for those wanting a luxurious, resort feel.
pros: Made of high-quality cotton, which allows for effective breathability and privacy
The automatic pop-spring attached to the canopy makes for a simple setup
Includes all the necessary attachments needed for hanging
cons: Does not fit bed sizes greater than a twin very well
A few customers had issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: The perfect color of pink
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! The perfect color of pink, not too pink. Quality is far better that I expected. It's an almost thick linen like material. It does need a good ironing when you get it as it comes folded up in a small bag. It was super easy to assemble and hang.
customer_reviews.author: blair & amanda lively

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but untie metal hoop with caution!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and easy assembly. Looks great. Fabric does extend to the floor, no problem. Grey with slight pinkish tint. I added string lights and they were east to tie in along with the metal hoop. WARNING: When unpacking the metal hoop, hold it away from your face!!! It springs open and it scratched my glasses. I'm fortunate I was wearing them! Otherwise pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Windylimb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is gorgeous! Looks exactly like the photo and was perfect for my little girls room. I also purchased the string of star lights separate and it looks great! You will not be disappointed. I am avid amazon shopper and this may be one of my all time favorite finds/purchases!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make a “teepee” reading nook for granddaughter and it’s too cute! Got the fluffiest rug for the floor and she loves sitting in it to read. She’s only 3 so it’s absolutely perfect and way more cost efficient than buying a teepee.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but assemble carefully!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product is great and is exactly how it is described. The linen is of quality and it has a very elegant look to it. The only thing that sucked about this product, was the fact t that I was not prepared for the metal ring that holds the curtain’s round shape at the top, to shoot open in .0056 seconds after untying the string. I had my daughter in my lap and it actually hit her in the throat.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Cute canopy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bought for a reading nook in my daughters room. Love the gray color, fabric is soft and not scratchy and was very easy to assemble and hang. Only thing was you had to put the metal in the top of the canopy to form the circle and it came rusted so we had to clean it off before we assembled so it wouldn’t stain the fabric. That was disappointing. But overall cute and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meditate
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a meditation space in her room. This worked beautifully. It also make a great reading nook.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tramutola

customer_reviews.title: Cute canopy!
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is very nice! The material seems durable and is a very pretty pink--kind of a dusty pink. I don't have it up yet, or I would post a picture. I will when I do. I'm very happy with this item. Will be adorable for my granddaughter's play room! :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bublitz

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous unwrapping!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review solely about the disaster that is the metal ring to hold open the top of the canopy. It arrived in little ties and after untying them the entire metal ring flung open to expand and smacked me in the face, leaving a cut across my nose, before flying across the room. It’s the most dangerous and unnecessary way to package it and I now know other people have said the same comment yet it still arrives this way. Thankfully it just missed hitting my toddler in the face as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Niver

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to receive this canopy. She tired of her pink one. It matches well and is lightweight enough to not block cool air coming in from her window. I steamed it a bit to get wrinkles out, but overall it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Viva B.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Gift For A Baby Girl's Room
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to our new niece and it's lovely. Beautiful and perfect for a lovely new princess's room! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: A great look, but be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for - gives a similar look to what you find on Instagram. Fabric is relatively thick, and I put it through the dryer to unwrinkle it. Previous reviews are 100% correct about the hoop expanding violently when you open it - I was aware of that and though I was careful, it still slightly pinched my hand when it sprung open. I’d buy it again in a heartbeat though.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! And so does our son. A cozy place to read stories, or just take a little rest. Easy to assemble, easy to hang. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S_HIGGINS_CO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a play area or bedroom. Very neat and easy to clean around.
customer_reviews.author: stan geiger

customer_reviews.title: Great Princess Tent
customer_reviews.text: Just what I'd hoped for. Material is a good quality not see-through cotton. I was afraid it might be that netting material. So glad it isnt!😁
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Bought and used for my daughters first birthday! Added Pom Pom trim to the opening and it was stunning! Def. a hit!
customer_reviews.author: motherofallthings

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids that won’t yank it down though
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected! I have had to see it, as my students have pulled it down a few times. Good for kids that won’t yank it down though!
customer_reviews.author: EricaP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! I thought it would take me more time but the double sided tape to hold the mount while you screw it in is genius and effective. It looks just like the photo and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this item for my daughter’s room
customer_reviews.text: Completely easily to put together and looks amazing up! Pictures to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this canopy! Worth every penny. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: EJRaptor

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after a few days
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to have her princess canopy set up. It took a couple days of moderate use and the fabric completely ripped from the top. Unable to fix this and have a very disappointed 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink one. When I opened the package, they sent me gray but it still fits in my daughters room. Good quality, thick material. It’s easy to assemble but make sure when you open the wire that’s coiled, you hold it away from your face as it springs open.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Great investment piece for any little girl's nursery or bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the perfect addition to the nursery! Glad I went with the canvas canopy vs a netted canopy. I can tell it will last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: JWilder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when untying the metal hoop, it flings open with quite a bit of force. Material is nice & thick but not heavy, it’s light blocking, set up was pretty easy with a couple options on how to hang it up (screws or adhesive sticker)
customer_reviews.author: William A Hans

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Great price! Light weight and easy to assemble. It came with a hook as well as the option to just hang by sticky pad, which we chose, and it is holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Kouns

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the canopy. I did have to iron but not bad. Installing with the screws provided was a little tricky but workable. Over all satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old dtr just loves her “princess tent” good quality at great price, adding LED light just makes for a perfect combination.. very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: It goes perfect in my granddaughters room. She absolutely loves it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes A Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Tucks away my things well as well as adding a beautiful accent in the corner
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a canopy, read reviews prior, great price point since giving it a try. It is great and machine washable. Be careful taking the ring from the package. It will pop out and don't want the metal to injure you. Just get it!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to create a little reading nook in my daughter's room, and she loves it, and I love it. I was skeptical but it's nice material, and stays in place great! Color is true to the picture, I'm pretty happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the value
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! They are so excited for their reading nook.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Great color. I have really tall ceilings (9 ft) and it fit without having to make any adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Veronese

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkly but looks fine anyway
customer_reviews.text: Nice but wrinkled though I can’t be bothered to iron 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Laine Kartes

customer_reviews.title: The last piece to a perfect bedroom !
customer_reviews.text: I have slowly been building a nursery to bring our little one home to, and there was always something missing until I discovered the perfect little canopy tents! Thank you for your quick shipping, I received it within days !! Stacey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this canopy, for the money it cute. Put it over my daughters crib. The only thing is, the adhesive for the selling is not that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Parris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We wanted one that wasnt see through. This one is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this’ It fits perfectly over my daugthers bed. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Abiola Ajala

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it after looking at so many options online and in stores. Great material. Doesn’t look cheap. Exactly what I was looking for. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Priya S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. We liked the color and that it was cotton
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bracamontes

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The canapy looked great...however the tie was so weak that within an hour of hanging it my daughter was sitting in it and a slight tug ripped the canapy from the tie which was still attached to the ceiling . So now I have a$30 piece of trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is made of material and not netting ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter hung it in her room the same day it came and put lights in it. She has slept in it every night since. I love that it is made of material and not netting too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the first one I ordered never was received i ended ...
customer_reviews.text: the first one I ordered never was received i ended up having to reorder a new one. once I did get it the quality is decent enough
customer_reviews.author: kara d mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality ties on top
customer_reviews.text: Broke after hanging for 24 hours, very poor quality ties on top.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what we wanted. Our little girl loves it. We used it for a reading canopy. The gray color was s lighter gray which we love. The fabric is great quality. I would highly recommend this. I looke for weeks finding a good canopy at a afforadorable price. I’m glad I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: ksom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this up in our daughter’s room since Christmas but we really like it so far. It was super easy to put together and love that it comes with something we can adhere to the ceiling to hang the canopy from so we don’t have to drill a hole. So far it is holding up well with a 2 year going in and out of it. The color and feel of the material are really nice. Would order another one of these in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful pink color and hangs great from the ceiling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this canopy hanging over her twin bed. Its a beautiful pink color and hangs great from the ceiling. It gave you 2 options for hanging which I loved, so we could decide how we wanted to hang it. Its perfect for a little girls room or nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Careful when drilling in the ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Wear goggles when drilling into the ceiling. Otherwise this thing is great. Its a standard size, not one of the huge ones and the fabric is pretty thick, not transparent or light.
customer_reviews.author: Ash G.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the picture perfect nook, the color in this picture is totally wrong this color is peach is not dusty rose!! Is your looking for peach then your good! Great material , it has a little weight to it so I wouldn’t recommend in very hot environments!
customer_reviews.author: Nemesis wu

customer_reviews.title: good length and quality material
customer_reviews.text: good length and quality material. the hanger could be better, my baby stepped on the side and it tore off the hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Keoni & Kalae Martins

customer_reviews.title: Order grey and received pink :/
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little annoying to install, but nothing too crazy. I ordered grey, but received pink.i really don’t feel like dealing with a return. 😒 Update; it already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Alovey

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them and my girls love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bengie

customer_reviews.title: Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used for my 13yr old daughter for an idea of having a corner quiet spot in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cady

customer_reviews.title: Loop ripped off 2nd day.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute canopy. However, the 2nd day after we put it up, the fabric ring that you hang it up with ripped off. I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LC/LX

customer_reviews.title: Pink and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as the picture describes- it’s the perfect addition to my little girls room.
customer_reviews.author: jessica czebiniak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and hang. Exactly what I wanted in color and quality. Nice addition to my daughters room
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: We love the look of this and it is a heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of this and it is a heavy material. The strings from the top came apart and we had to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gray canopy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. A bit pricey if you ask me, but the color ws just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Martha B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it just color is not as pink as picture showed more of a peach
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this item. Very cheaply made. I would like to return please
customer_reviews.author: Perel Lichter

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble; however, one the the strings broke off while I was trying to tie the metal ring in place. Other than that good quality and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Perfect color, looks just like the picture. And they’ll hug a kitten for ya
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It ain't see through fabric like other canopy.
customer_reviews.author: yumi kim

customer_reviews.title: Peach NOT pink
customer_reviews.text: Thinking about returning this. It is not even close to pink, more of an ugly dull peach.
customer_reviews.author: Cluevious

feature_bullets: GREAT QUALITY & DURABLE NETTING: Made of high quality cotton, soft, breathable and healthy. Designed for maximum resistance against bursting, each net is strong and stretchy for your comfort.
CREATE CHILDREN'S OWN GAME SPACE: Baby sleep can isolate external interference, Can be inside of bed account hanging some Nightlight, put on a piece of game pad and baby pillow toys

GIVE KIDS ENOUGH SECURITY: childhood period everyone has some certain attachment to the corner that feel exudes a unique sense of security, Give your baby a dream and heaven and earth, Let kids put down to iPad, and peer play

DECORATE CHILDREN'S ROOM: for a little girls or boys room or a bedroom makeover, beautiful and functional, Hanging ring in center, round dome bed canopy, it is ideal for keeping all the terrible and annoying flying bugs/mosquitoes/insects away recreate a beautiful girl's princess bed
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: The 1 point hanging system allows for easy setup with no assembly skills needed. The sturdy automatic pop up ring holds the net in place with ease.
